extendedInfo.description: Add Ringtones and Notification sounds from any compatible soundboard.This app both lets you use any compatible soundboard's sounds as ringtones and notifications and can as a bonus be used to quickly play your favourite sounds, once you've added them as a ringtone.Long-press on the saved Ringtones to set or remove them.Requires a compatible Soundboard to do anything interesting.Problems, bugs, issues, suggestions? Email me, or lodge an issue on the tracker.

reviews.title: .....ugh
reviews.comment: Yes, it let\'s us set soundboard clips as ringtones.....but that\'s ALL it does. My favorite clip? I can\'t use it for when I receive text messages, only for e-mails. I want to be able to customize what \"notification\" means, not just the default that never gets used. Why can\'t I just save the sound to my phone? Why do I need a whole other app to do something as simple as set a sound clip as a ringtone? I use this app because I have to, not because it functions well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great on my Atrix 2
reviews.comment: No problems what do ever and my Pinkie Pie theme is finally complete!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works fine on my gn2
reviews.comment: Worked on my old galaxy and works on my note 2. No problems, it\'s fun and it\'s FREE. No permissions asked either.people need to stop bitching and be thankful
reviews.author: ben diaz

reviews.title: Uhm...
reviews.comment: When I restarted my Droid Razr, I lost the ability to use my favourite Rainbow Dash line as a Notification tone. Says \"Failed to create ringtone.\" Crap, crap, crap... And just integrate this into your MLP board and take this trash broken app off the market!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Problem with HTC
reviews.comment: Says fail to create ringtone on the HTC since the new update please fix. The default notification sounds are irritating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Failed to create requested ringtone
reviews.comment: If your phone turn off for whatever reason...you have to reinstall the app to use your ringtone/notification again or else you get that error message. Broken app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just wanna say
reviews.comment: I, for one, am glad you\'ve kept all these parts separate for those who only want certain parts for storage/permission/etc reasons. I doubt the glitches would be fixed by integration. Hey, where\'s your soundboard now!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: down ringtone
reviews.comment: I think this game will be good

reviews.title: Ringtone bug
reviews.comment: Tone goes back to Android default when I reboot and won\'t set back my desired tone again unless I uninstall the app. Please fix.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great...when it works
reviews.comment: Very buggy on my G2. Works fine for several days, then I need to re-apply the notifications...but I\'m not allowed to re-use a sound I\'ve already used.
reviews.author: A Google User
